title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Competencies: Mobile Microlearning Design for Experiential Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners complete tasks based on real-world language use scenarios with 80% or higher accuracy
Learners revise and improve language tasks three or more times incorporating peer feedback

Learners can write weekly reflective journals over 2–4 weeks analyzing the linkage between software development theories (e.g., design patterns, algorithms) and practical projects (e.g., GitHub repository implementation) and receive a ‘B+’ or higher in at least three of five evaluator-provided criteria (e.g., theoretical applicability, practical relevance).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
